item.description:
Hi Trailblazers join us for an evening of hilarious Horror! Enjoy cocktail seating with a cash bar, light supper, dessert and snacks while down-and-out Skid Row floral attendant, Seymour, contentedly attends to an exotic plant that he has named Audrey II in honor of the love of his life, Audrey. Seymour soon discovers that this is no ordinary plant as it grows into an ill-tempered, foul-mouthed, R&B singing carnivore with a craving for blood. Finally revealing its true identity, Audrey II offers Seymour fame and fortune in exchange for feeding its voracious appetite. One of the longest running Off-Broadway shows of all time, this charming, tuneful and hilarious spoof of 1950s sci-fi movies was composed by Alan Menken and written by Howard Ashman. Little Shop of Horrors is directed by Anthony Ejarque and Sharon Asher Arsenault with musical direction by William Asher and choreography by Emily K. *The orchestra seats are removed and the floor is flat with cocktail seating! *Cash Bar. 18+ *Light Supper, Desserts and Snacks by the Portable Pantry. *So that table can be arranged to seat your party: please call the box office to reserve your tables. *Wheelchair/Handicap accessibility in balcony only.

The show start's at 8pm so come early say around 7:30. The cost is $25. 

For RSVP contact the Rochester Opera House at: TICKET OFFICE: (603) 335-1992 M/W/F 10am-5pm
Rochester Opera House | City Hall | 31 Wakefield Street | Rochester, NH 03867
Rochester Opera House is a Not-For-Profit Organization

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Little Shop of Horrors
